tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProcurementSchedule ( 
   schedule_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY, 
   schedule_date DATE, 
   product_id VARCHAR(50), 
   supplier_id VARCHAR(50), 
   quantity INT 
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
   sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_id INT,
   sale_date DATE,
   quantity_sold INT,
   revenue DECIMAL,
   FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
   product_id INT,
   stock_quantity INT,
   restock_date DATE,
   PRIMARY KEY (product_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    procurement_quantity INT,
    status VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
